headline: Carrier Board of Directors Announces Increase in Quarterly Dividend to $0.24 per Share
summary: Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE: CARR), global leader in intelligent climate and energy solutions, announced today that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend of $0.24 per outstanding share of Carrier common stock. The dividend will be payable on February 9, 2026 to shareowners of record at the close of business on January 20, 2026.

headline: Comfort Systems Climbs 29% in 3 Months: Should You Buy the Surge?
summary: Can FIX's data-center surge, massive backlog and strong liquidity keep powering further, even as its premium valuation stretches expectations?
